column6: a company which mills rice and corn
column7: rice was accidently dumped over a worker.------ ------The victim was a 16-year-old boy named  Sopheak
column11: confirmed that the victim had been covered with rice to a depth of 2.50 meters.------Many fellow workers came to dig the victim out. He was found about 20 minutes later.  ------The unconscious victim was taken to the district hospital for treatment
